pageContext.claim: “What bothers me? When I see a Nancy Pelosi trying to defend this monster from Iran, who has killed so many people, who has so badly -- I mean, so many people are walking around now without legs and without arms.”
pageContext.analysis: Pelosi did not try to defend Iranian Gen. Qasem Soleimani; she questioned the timing of the killing and asked why there had been no congressional notification.
